name: Kings In The Sheets: An Adult Yuri On Ice Fanzine
name_original: Kings In The Sheets: An Adult Yuri On Ice Fanzine
description:
Kings In The Sheets: An Adult Yuri On Ice Fanzine is a game developed by kingotabekzines. It came out on 06-07-2018.
Kings In The Sheets: An Adult Yuri On Ice Fanzine is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
